issue.title: [GLib] Return ChunkedArray instead of Array in gparquet_arrow_file_reader_read_column
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4048](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4048). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Because FileReader::ReadColumn(int i, std::shared_ptr<Array>\* out) is deprecated since 0.12.
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/3171/files#diff-e6f49fbed784ef27e3ab0075e01a5871R132>

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4048?focusedCommentId=16722496) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 3192
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/3192>
